title: Far Eastern Tales
description: Far Eastern Tales is a collection of Maugham's short stories, all born of his experiences in Malaysia, Singapore, and other outposts of the former British Empire. The stories included on this recording are: "Footprints in the Jungle", "Mabel", "P & O", "The Door of Oportunity", "The Buried Talent", "Before the Party", "Mr. Know-all", "Neil MacAdam", "The End of the Flight" and "The Force of Circumstance".
author: W. Somerset Maugham
